name: Arla Foods amba
membership: Milchindustrieverband; Dairy UK; LandbrugFødevarer; DIFødevarer; NZO; Finnish Dairy Association; LRF Mjölk; BCZ-CBL, EDA, AIM
goal: Arla Foods is a cooperative owned by 9,900 farmers from seven EU member states (Germany, UK, Denmark, Sweden, Belgium, Luxembourg and The Netherlands). Arla produces dairy products and sells them globally in more than 100 countries under brands like LURPAK, CASTELLO, ARLA and PUCK.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Environment, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives:
Agriculture and food policy
Environment and climate policy
Circular Economy
Commerical policy and legislation
Brexit
Trade
Corporate Social Responsibility
Competition law
IP
